snippet.title: Risk & Riches Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A roguelite deckbuilder set in the American West during the late 1800s. Descend into a mine to battle monsters and demons to gather gold. Purchase buildings, cards, and equipment to gain enough strength to overcome the trials within the mine and extinguish the evil within.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2990670/Risk__Riches/
